data.text: I lodo tuai midi au guu mmada gi taane e daahi dana uga hagatau mee i lodo dono lima.
Au ga heeu, “Goe hana gi hee?”
Nomuli gei au gaa mmada gi tangada di langi dela nogo leelee mai gi di au nomua, gaa duu gi mua, ge tuai dangada di langi ga hanimoi gi baahi o mee.

Tangada di langi matagidagi ga helekai gi tangada di langi dela i golo, “Lele hagi anga ina gi tama daane dela e daahi dana uga hagatau mee bolo nia daangada mono manu ga dogologowaahee i lodo Jerusalem ga deloaa di duuli go nia abaaba.
Dimaadua gu hagababa bolo Ia go di abaaba ahi e haganiga di waahale e duuli di maa, Mee gaa noho i golo mo ono madamada huogodoo.”

Dimaadua gu helekai gi ana daangada, “Au gu haga modoho goodou gii noho dagidahi i lodo nia gowaa huogodoo. Malaa, dolomeenei goodou ala e noho i nnenua mai i daha, goodou llele gi daha mo Babylonia, hula gi muli gi Jerusalem.
Tangada dela ma ga daaligi goodou, mee e daaligi hua di mee dela e kaedahi e hagalabagau mai gi di Au.”
“Ma go Dimaadua modo go Ia dela ga heebagi hai baahi adu gi goodou, gei digau ala nogo hai hege adu gi goodou i mua, gaa kae godou goloo.”
Dimaadua ga helekai, “Nia daangada Jerusalem, daahili tenetene! Au gaa noho i godou baahi!”
I di madagoaa deelaa, nia henua e logo ga lloomoi gi Dimaadua gaa hai nia daangada ni Mee. Mee gaa noho i godou baahi, gei goodou ga iloo bolo Mee ne hagau mai au gi goodou.
Judah gaa hai tenua hagalabagau labelaa ni Dimaadua i lodo dono henua dabu, gei Jerusalem gaa hai di waahale dela e kaedahi e aloho iei Mee.
Noho deemuu huogodoo i mua o Dimaadua, idimaa Mee e haneia i dono Gowaa Dabuaahia.
